title: The Sims 2.rar
description:
After going through a lot of trial and error trying to get it to work, I decided to upload my working files all in one place.

//**********************************************************************************************************************************
//
// J@ricanese

//**********************************************************************************************************************************

Okay this is how I got it to work.

	Daemon Tools - 

		What i did was go to their website http://www.disc-tools.com/download/daemon
		and download Daemon Tools Lite.

		Or you may download it using my torrent http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4331980

	Keys - 
	
		BKUL-CS68-J6AT-37Y7-KX4F

		THA2-Z3FK-OR1A-3HZ4-2WUS

		374U-U5GT-1RZ9-4PDG-T5QZ

		DKSS-YCA2-ZO11-SSP7-3AFH

		XUT3-6LHW-ZOR1-JH7N-VV7I

		DWJ2-Q92Z-R1R1-5F6R-077P

Install Directions:

1) Install Daemon Tools.
2) When DAEMON Tools install is complete and it appears in your system tray, right-click the icon,go to emulation and make sure
	that SafeDisk is ON.
2) Mount The_sims_2.iso and install as you normally would. 
3) When the it request a key use one from above. When installation is done don&#039;t bother
	running it.

Playing Directions:

1)To play, you must mount the Sims2_1_RIP.MDS to a virtual drive using DAEMON Tools.

*Remember SafeDisk emulation must be on.
